G

game - package game
A package used often in gaming, although other uses are possible.
Game - Class in game
The game class.
Game() - Constructor for class game.Game
Creates a new Game, and sets it pause to false.
GameTest - Class in gametests
Tests the Game class.
GameTest() - Constructor for class gametests.GameTest
 
gametests - package gametests
Tests the game package.
getAnimation() - Method in class animations.Sprite
Returns the animation.
getDuration() - Method in class animations.AnimeFrame
Queries the duration of the visibility of the frame.
getDx() - Method in class animations.Sprite
Gets the acceleration of the x.
getDy() - Method in class animations.Sprite
Gets the acceleration of the y.
getElapsedTime() - Method in class game.Game
Gets the elapsed time in milliSeconds.
getFrame(int) - Method in class animations.Animation
Returns the frame at the given index.
getFrame() - Method in class animations.AnimeFrameTest
Gets the frame used in this test.
getHeight() - Method in class animations.Sprite
Gets the height of the sprite, which is the heigth of the current image.
getImage() - Method in class animations.Animation
Gets the image of the current frame.
getImage() - Method in class animations.AnimeFrame
Gets the image.
getImage() - Method in class animations.Sprite
Gets the image currently displayed by the Sprite.
getLastTime() - Method in class game.Game
Returns the last time the time was updated.
getMaximumSimultaniousSounds(AudioFormat) - Static method in class sound.SoundManager
Gets the maximum amount of sounds of the given format the player can play, with the default mixer.
getPool() - Method in class concurrencytest.ThreadPoolTest
Returns the Pool.
getSound(String) - Method in class sound.SoundManager
 
getWidth() - Method in class animations.Sprite
Gets the width of the sprite, which is the width of the current image.

getY() - Method in class animations.Sprite
